metadata.title: Next Agent Handoff - Comprehensive Review and Audit
metadata.purpose: Prepare the next agent to review, audit, and validate all work in the agents directory, recipes, kitchen/ingredients systems, and timestamps.

review_scope: All documentation and execution plans in ai-Q/agents/
All recipes in ai-Q/recipes/ and subdirectories
All kitchen and ingredients systems and subdirectories
All inline timestamps in all above systems
required_actions: Perform a comprehensive audit of the agents directory for compliance with naming, timestamp, and directory standards.
Review all documentation for completeness, accuracy, and technical debt.
Validate all recipes for completeness, modularity, and atomicity.
Audit the kitchen and ingredients systems for implementation quality and standards compliance.

Check all inline timestamps in all documentation, recipes, kitchen, and ingredients systems and subdirectories. Report and fix any that are not >= 2025-07-01T00:00:00Z or do not match filename timestamps.
Document all findings, errors, and incomplete work in a new analysis document.
Provide a comprehensive summary and recommendations for next steps.
handoff_checklist: ✓ No files in ARCHIVE root directory
✓ All agent names removed from filenames

next_agent_mandate: You must assume the previous agent made errors. Double-check all work, validate every document, and ensure zero technical debt. Provide a comprehensive analysis and summary of the entire agents directory, recipes, kitchen/ingredients systems, and all inline timestamps. Document your findings and recommendations for the next phase.
conclusion: The system is ready for your comprehensive review and audit. Please ensure all standards are met and document any issues or improvements needed.
